meanings.definition: The surgical removal of internal organs within a body cavity.
meanings.sent1: The exenteration was necessary to save the patient's life.
meanings.sent2: The doctor performed an exenteration to remove the diseased organs.
meanings.sent3: During the exenteration, the surgeon found a surprise hidden object.
meanings.sent4: Her exenteration of clutter from the room left it feeling spacious and clean.
meanings.sent5: The exenteration of the tumor was a delicate and precise procedure.

meanings.definition: The act of removing the contents of a body cavity.
meanings.sent1: After the exenteration, the body cavity was empty.
meanings.sent2: The exenteration of the stomach contents was challenging.
meanings.sent3: The exenteration of the fridge revealed expired food items.
meanings.sent4: His exenteration of emotions left him feeling numb.
meanings.sent5: The exenteration of the box revealed a hidden treasure.
